mutants.original_line: stop_words = {"the", "a", "an", "and", "etc"}
mutants.mutated_line: words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())
mutants.code:
import re
from collections import Counter

def find_most_common_words(text):
    stop_words = {'', 'a', 'an', 'and', 'etc'}
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word not in stop_words and len(word) >= 3]
    word_counts = Counter(filtered_words)
    sorted_words = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_words[:5]

mutants.mutated_line: words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())

import re
from collections import Counter

def find_most_common_words(text):
    stop_words = {'the', 'a', 'an', 'and', 'etc'}
    words = re.findall('\\b\\w+\\b', text.lower())
    filtered_words = [word for word in words if word not in stop_words and len(word) >= 3]
    word_counts = Counter(filtered_words)
    sorted_words = sorted(word_counts.items(), key=lambda x: x[-1], reverse=True)
    return sorted_words[:5]
